doc.title: O'Finnegan's Wake
doc.plot: You see O'Finnegan, who is supposed to be dead, carried in and laid in his coffin. His wife is weeping bitterly. Several men are present at the "wake," smoking and drinking. Finally, O'Finnegan rises in his coffin and takes a drink himself. Every one becomes frightened and they fall to the floor. This is a subject that will win an encore.
